title: Charlize Theron is the spitting image of Megyn Kelly as she battles Fox in new Bombshell trailer
text:
Nicole Kidman, Charlize Theron and Margot Robbie's latest project Bombshell is ripped straight from the headlines.

The latest trailer for the film, which follows the sexual misconduct scandals surrounding late Fox News founder Roger Ailes, sees Kidman transform into anchor Gretchen Carlson as she goes to war with the media mogul.

Meanwhile, Megyn Kelly (played by Theron) deals with the frenzy around vulgar comments made about her by President Trump during the 2016 election.

Dropping bombs: Nicole Kidman transforms into Gretchen Carlson in Bombshell, whose latest trailer came out Tuesday

Robbie plays Kayla Pospisil, a new Fox producer who is forced to become accustomed to the network's sensationalizing - and sometimes predatory - ways.

She gets a crash course in Fox New's style by Kate McKinnon's character, who tells Kayla: 'Ask yourself what would scare my grandmother or piss off my grandfather, that's a Fox story.'

Next, Gretchen is seen showing a montage of clips of her being harassed by her fellow anchors to a lawyer before reading off a handwritten list of insults directed at her by fellow Fox employees and head honcho Roger Ailes (John Lithgow) himself.
